open.title: Vuma Villages Outage | Gauteng
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Vumatel engineers are continuing to investigate the cause of the outages. We apologize for the issues experienced.
